title: Super Shirt Folding Technique
body: Save minutes at the laundromat (or your mom's basement) <a href="http://www.milkandcookies.com/links/15594/">folding shirts</a>.  I had seen it before, then I lost the link, regardless, it's nothing short of amazing.
bodyArticleHtml:

Super Shirt Folding Technique

Save minutes at the laundromat (or your mom's basement)

bodyNavItems.text: I don't understand why I think this is so funny
